links.description: The Stream is a new data type introduced with Redis 5.0, which models a log data structure in a more abstract way. links.title: Under what conditions do fossils form?
links.description: For a fossil to form, several conditions have to be met. First of all, the animal had to live in the given area! Animals live in many environments on Earth, but not everywhere. The water above many lake bottoms and many areas of the deep ocean bottom are stagnant. The bottom water is never exchanged with surface waters, so the water contains no dissolved oxygen. Animals cannot live without oxygen, so no animals live there.

links.description: We demonstrate the feasibility of a spoofing attack on the GPS receiver of a phasor measurement unit (PMU). We formulate the attack as an optimization problem where the objective is to maximize the difference between the PMU's receiver clock offset (with respect to the GPS time measured by the onboard satellite clocks) before and after the attack. Since the PMU uses this clock offset to compute a synchronized time stamp for its measurements, an e...

The astute reader will remember my previous exercise in head-butting a brick wall, with the thieving arseholes at Society6 [and, as referenced therein, further cranial intra-muralisation sessions with Amazon Merch and Spreadshirt]. As yet, this week’s inductees for Fuckwitts' Corner haven’t actually stole...

links.title: How Did the British Press Cover the American Revolution?
links.description: And what lessons does this history hold for today’s upheavals?
